Title: Something Ricked This Way Comes
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), Mike McMahan, Eric Acosta (staff writer), Tom Kauffman (staff writer), Wade Randolph (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: Summer gets a job at a pawn shop owned by the devil. Jerry helps Morty with his science fair project.
